keyword: how many calories in pita bread
title: How Many Calories in Pita Bread?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in pita bread per standard piece, plus carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in Pita Bread?
assumptions: Standard white pita bread, 6-inch diameter, about 60g, plain without fillings or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, flour type, and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One standard pita bread contains about 165 kcal and 33g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Whole wheat pita bread instead of white
Add 1 tsp butter spread on top

faqs.q: How many calories in one pita bread?
faqs.a: About 165 kcal for a standard 6-inch white pita bread.

faqs.q: Are pita breads high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, one pita has around 33g carbs, mostly from flour.

faqs.q: How much protein in pita bread?
Does whole wheat pita have fewer calories?
faqs.a: Slightlyâ€”about 155 kcal per pita, with more fiber.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in pita bread?
faqs.a: Around 300mg per pita, varying by brand and recipe.
